articles.author: Danielle Wallace
articles.title: AOC, campaigning for Bernie Sanders, says it would 'be an honor' to be VP
articles.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio Cortez, D-N.Y., said it would "be an honor to be vice president” in a recent Spanish-language interview Sunday before headlining a Las Vegas campaign event for Sen. Bernie Sanders.
articles.content:
Rep. Alexandria Ocasio Cortez, D-N.Y., said it would "be an honor to be vice president” in a recent Spanish-language interview Sunday before headlining a Las Vegas campaign event for Sen. Bernie Sanders.
The 30-year-old freshman congresswoman quickly pointed… [+2490 chars]

articles.author: Danielle Wallace
articles.title: AOC rips Trump, defends socialism in Spanish-language interview: 'If president thinks I'm crazy, that's a good thing'
articles.description: If President Trump thinks she's crazy, "I think that's a good thing," U.S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., said Sunday in an interview for Spanish-language television.
articles.content:
If President Trump thinks she's crazy, "I think that's a good thing," U.S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., said Sunday in an interview for Spanish-language television.

articles.author: Yael Halon
articles.title: Christianity Today's call for Trump's removal would have 'disappointed' Billy Graham, his son says
articles.description: The late Rev. Billy Graham would have been "disappointed" that his name was invoked in Christianity Today's recent call for President Trump's removal from office, Graham's son told Fox News on Monday night in an exclusive interview.
articles.content:
The late Rev. Billy Graham would have been "disappointed" that his name was invoked in Christianity Today's recent call for President Trump's removal from office, Graham's son told Fox News on Monday night in an exclusive interview.

articles.author: Jack Durschlag
articles.title: Dublin Zoo tiger 'attacks' young boy -- only to be stopped by glass partition
articles.description: A young boy and his family got more than they bargained for this past weekend at the Dublin Zoo in Ireland when they received a close-up view of a tiger in full attack mode.
articles.content:
A young boy and his family got more than they bargained for this past weekend at the Dublin Zoo in Ireland when they received a close-up view of a tiger in full attack mode.
Thankfully, the glass wall of the zoo's tiger enclosure saved the family from harm.… [+768 chars]
